task.title: How to Set up an Interview Space
task.shortdesc: These instructions will show you how to set up the best professional interview space in AirClassroom.

taskbody.prereq:
Rent the Professional Lighting set or pieces of it from the receptionist if you do not have one or more of the items requied
2 Professional Stand-Up Lights
1 Reflector
1 Camera
1 Cameraman
1 Large white backdrop
2 Clip-on Microphones

step.cmd: Put up the 2 stand-up lights about 5 feet away from each other at the front of the room
step.info: The front of the room has the best ambience

step.cmd: Plug in the lights into the sockets in the front of the room
Set up the reflector behind the 2 stand-up lights
Set up the large white backdrop behind the reflector
Give the camera to you cameraman
Set the cameraman 4 feet away from where you are going to interview
Clip the microphones onto your shirt and the interviewee's shirt, near the neck
